name: Shivu
History:
Hypertension: Amlodipine 5mg and Losartan 50mg daily.

Type 2 Diabetes: Metformin 500mg twice daily.

name: Shanti
History:
Type 2 Diabetes: Managed with Metformin, Insulin Glargine, lifestyle changes, and blood glucose monitoring.

Hypertension: Treated with Losartan.

Diabetic Neuropathy: Treated with Gabapentin for nerve pain.

High Cholesterol: Managed with Atorvastatin.

Diabetic Retinopathy: Undergoing regular eye checkups and laser therapy.

GERD: Controlled with Omeprazole.

Chronic Fatigue: Supplemented with Vitamin D and B12.

Foot Ulcer: Treated with wound care and Mupirocin.

Seasonal Flu and COVID-19: Managed with Oseltamivir and supportive care.

name: Muthuraj

Alprazolam 0.25mg as needed (for acute anxiety).

name: Meenakshi
History:

Treatment: Amlodipine 5mg daily.

3. GERD (2024)

Treatment: Omeprazole 20mg daily.

Treatment: Loratadine 10mg and Fluticasone nasal spray.

6. Lower Back Pain (2021)

Treatment: Ibuprofen 400mg and physiotherapy.

7. Acute Bronchitis (2019)

Treatment: Amoxicillin 500mg.

name: Shashank
History:
Hypertension: Initially diagnosed in 2020, managed with Amlodipine 5mg daily, later added Losartan 50mg in 2023 due to rising blood pressure. Currently stable at 135/85 mmHg.

Other Conditions: Hypercholesterolemia (managed with Atorvastatin), GERD (treated with Omeprazole), Tension Headaches, Seasonal Allergies, Vitamin D Deficiency, Obesity.

Lifestyle Management: Continuous focus on a low-sodium diet, regular exercise, and weight loss efforts to help manage hypertension and overall health

name: Pawan Kumar
History: Sarah Johnson has been managing hypothyroidism since 2020, with stable thyroid levels on Levothyroxine. Over the past five years, she also developed high cholesterol, migraines, hypertension, and GERD, which are all being managed with medications like Atorvastatin, Propranolol, Lisinopril, and Omeprazole. Additionally, she recovered from upper respiratory infections and flu, and addressed anemia and vitamin D deficiency through supplements.
